## Preparation {#sec-prepro-preparation}

For Prepro 1 - 3, we will need the following packages: `dplyr`, `ggplot2`, `lubridate`, `readr` and `tidyr`. We recommend installing them *before* the first lesson. Individual packages are typically installed as follows:

```{r}
#| eval: false

install.packages("dplyr")     # Quotation marks are mandatory
install.packages("ggplot2")
...                           # etc.
```

The code below will automatically install all uninstalled packages.

```{r}
#| eval: false

ipak <- function(pkg) {
  new.pkg <- pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"])]
  if (length(new.pkg)) {
    install.packages(new.pkg, dependencies = TRUE)
  }
}

packages <- c("dplyr", "ggplot2", "lubridate", "readr", "tidyr")

ipak(packages)
```

You can also download the data for the exercises from [Moodle]().
